_sText:
Its a mini game where you use oldschool weapons to kill your enemies. Can be played as a free for all since you can use the weapons against your teammates, or could be team battles. The weapons include a spear a sword and a bow all work and move with you. I created all the weapons from scratch myself if you do take them at least give me credit especially since the bow was a bit tricky to make. [IMPORTANT-To fire the bow just press e on the string fire it as many times as you want, if experienced can be the most powerful weapon there.] Just a funny little map to joke around with. If you like the map please leave a comment so in the future I know to release more of this stuff I've made just sitting on my comp thanks. (no custom files included so no worries about that)
7v7 teams or 14 free for all
